hints.content:
$\begin{align}
&\blue{5=3+1}\\
&\blue{5=4}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $5$ is not the same as $4$.

$\begin{align}
&\pink{11=10+2}\\
&\pink{11=12}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $11$ is not the same as $12$.

$\begin{align}
&\purple{3=2+1}\\
&\purple{3=3}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $3$ is the same as $3$.
